amendment.description: To prevent United States companies from getting tax benefits for moving jobs overseas, to end offshore tax loopholes including inversions, and to provide incentives for United States companies to relocate overseas jobs to the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 523 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 94.

action.text: Amendment SA 523 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S1971-1972, S1984; text: CR S1971-1972) To prevent United States companies from getting tax benefits for moving jobs overseas, to end offshore tax loopholes including inversions, and to provide incentives for United States companies to relocate overseas jobs to the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 523 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 523 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 94.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 523 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 94.
